title: Game wont load after champion select
body: As soon as I join a game I pick a champion but it does not load. The attempting to reconnect button appears and even if I push it nothing happens.This happened after the patcht 9.16 launch.

replies.body: This has been a problem for at least a couple patches now. Until it's fixed, you need to go into the task manager, kill the game and the client, then relaunch the client.
